name: Shri Guru Granth Sahib Darpan
description: This is Gurbani App. This app is mobile version of web app gurugranthdarpan.net. This is Punjabi Translation of Shri Guru Granth Sahib Ji By prof. Sahib Singh Ji. All Contents in this app are taken from site:- http://gurugranthdarpan.net Please forgive me if any mistakes, I just used their Contents, if there is any difference shabads in app and the site pleease inform me. Thanks for all your supports    Waheguru ji ka Khalsa Waheguru Ji ki Fateh
